source.sqlReaderQuery:
CREATE TABLE #Check_atb_files (column_1 VARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL)
Declare @filename varchar(50)
Select @filename=concat('Account_',month(Getdate()-1),'.',day(Getdate()-1),'.',year(Getdate()-1),'.txt')
print @filename
exec('BULK Insert #Check_atb_files From ''C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\Task_7\'+@filename+'''
		With (FIRSTROW =2,  rowterminator = ''\n'');');


Select*from  #Check_atb_files

CREATE TABLE #Check_txn_char_files (column_1 VARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL)
Declare @filenametxn varchar(50)
Select @filenametxn=concat('Transaction-Charge__',month(Getdate()-1),'.',day(Getdate()-1),'.',year(Getdate()-1),'.txt')
print @filenametxn
exec('BULK Insert #Check_txn_char_files From ''C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\Task_7\'+@filenametxn+'''
		With (FIRSTROW =2,  rowterminator = ''\n'');');


Select*from  #Check_txn_char_files
